snippet.title: Plan B From Outer Space: A Bavarian Odyssey | Release Trailer
snippet.description:
👽🍺 OUT NOW on Steam, iOS and Android! 
Steam: http://onelink.to/planb
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.RobotPumpkinGamesGmbH.PlanBFromOuterSpaceMobile
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/de/app/plan-b-from-outer-space/id1585196926
Newsletter: https://mailchi.mp/assembleteam/assemble-newsletter
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/assembleteam
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/assembleteam
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/assembleteam/

▬ Assemble Entertainment ▬▬▬▬▬
Shop: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/AssembleEntertainment
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/assemble-entertainment
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/assembleteam
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/assembleteam
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/assembleteam/
Newsletter: https://mailchi.mp/assembleteam/assemble-newsletter
Website: http://www.assemble-entertainment.com/

▬ RobotPumpkin Games ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RobotPumpkinGames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/robot_pumpkin
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/robotpumpkingames/
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUTvSA9OX2-ORjIL-fDEbYw
Website: https://robotpumpkingames.webflow.io/

▬ About Plan B From Outer Space ▬▬
Plan B From Outer Space is an intergalactic adventure game in the style of an interactive book and takes inspiration from classic science-fiction stories and Bavarian culture. Design your very own Alien and try to escape the grasp of the “Barbvarians” as you navigate your own path through this unique sci-fi-comedy-text adventure. Every decision will affect the outcome of your mission; to leave this strange planet unscathed …or maybe you have a Plan B for this trip? Funded by the Film und Medien Stiftung NRW. #PlanBFromOuterSpace #Textadventure

▬ Features ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
• A Tribute: To classic science fiction and German culture, Plan B from Outer Space is a story-focused adventure with dozens of beautifully illustrated backgrounds and animated characters 
• Alps vs. Aliens: Design your very own alien with a unique background story and get ready to turn the small Bavarian town of “Unter-Hinterobersdorf” upside down
• Choices Matter: Every decision you make has a lasting effect on the story. Will you be a kind-hearted intergalactic traveller, a cruel conqueror … or something entirely different?
• Next-level:  Put your Alien-brains to the test with a selection of fun mini-games and equip items that will affect the story and your choice-options
• Platin-Alien: Fill the trophy-room in your spaceship by unlocking 19 different endings and discover hilarious easter eggs throughout your journey.

▬ Assemble Entertainment ▬▬▬▬▬▬
Founded in 2016 and based in Wiesbaden, Germany, Assemble Entertainment is an independent games developer best known for the survival city-builder Endzone - A World   Apart, which challenges players to survive and thrive following an environmental apocalypse, and the modernized Leisure Suit Larry series, featuring two new entries in the iconic decades-spanning saga. Despite the company's short history, Assemble Entertainment has won the German Developer Award twice — in 2020 and 2021— in the category "Best Publisher”. Assemble Entertainment organizes GermanDevDays, an annual conference held in Frankfurt, Germany since 2016 that attracts more than 1,100 attendees from across the German-speaking video game development industry. The event also includes the GermanDevDays Indie Award, where indie development teams across Germany can participate in varying categories to win a cash prize for their projects. The event is hosted by Stefan Marcinek, CEO and Founder of Assemble Entertainment. More on www.germandevdays.com and www.assemble-entertainment.com. @AssembleTeam #AssembleEntertainment

▬ More Links ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Livestream: https://www.twitch.tv/assembleentertainment
Assemble Discord: https://discord.com/invite/assemble-entertainment
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/assemble-entertainment/
Endzone Discord: https://discord.com/invite/worldofendzone
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/AssembleEntertainment/

▬ More Games  ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Endzone - A World Apart: https://youtu.be/O7eLGc0judo?list=PLEM2iueadJ3Ihy-ItrWqQH72FpcNQjGdw
Leisure Suit Larry – Wet Dreams Don’t Dry: https://youtu.be/c-6WyjEJFVk?list=PLEM2iueadJ3KRexrNB03Ocpz-cGNeHVaB
Lacuna: https://youtu.be/sWh4Fzv7vLE?list=PLEM2iueadJ3Klskv1WdlD2uew01TMX6KB
Orbital Bullet: https://youtu.be/hS5TBMEHYlQ?list=PLEM2iueadJ3KoD1PoEF2hSDp5-NvGLhyC
ITORAH: https://youtu.be/CPJvHciJpwY?list=PLEM2iueadJ3J51klutPCVfYV1QjcE8-xE
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
